1.03.name: wordpress/connect-address
1.03.description: Connect Address is a very unique service which uses social networks such as Facebook, Linkedin, Google, as well as Email and SMS/Txt to retrieve shipping addresses for ecommerce sites. This plugin requires a shopping cart to work and what it does is sets off a process to go and get the address from the recipient. Once the address has been retrieved, the address is uploaded directly into the buyers shipping form when checking out. How To Get Started: 1) Click the "Activate" link to the left of this description, 2) Sign up for an ConnectAddress API key, and 3) Go to your ConnectAddress configuration page, and save your API key.
